localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Momento provide a powerful tool to help you manage your domains and SSL certificates to prevent you from forgetting. With Momento you can renew your domains, manage your DNS and buy new domains from all your registrars. Everything in one place.
blogPost.body: Momento provide a powerful tool to help you manage your domains and SSL certificates to prevent you from forgetting. With Momento you can renew your domains, manage your DNS and buy new domains from all your registrars. Everything in one place.
blogPost.title: Momento - A powerful platform to help you manage your domains
blogPost.author: Luca Rossi

localize.description: 时刻提供一个强大的工具来帮助您管理您的域和SSL证书，以防止您忘记。使用MOMENTO，您可以续订您的域名，管理您的DNS，并从您的所有注册商购买新的域名。所有东西都放在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 一个功能强大的平台，可帮助您管理您的域

localize.description: 時刻提供一個強大的工具來幫助您管理您的域和SSL證書，以防止您忘記。使用MOMENTO，您可以續訂您的域名，管理您的DNS，並從您的所有註冊商購買新的域名。所有東西都放在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 一個功能強大的平臺，可幫助您管理您的域
